thread.section_title: Le Pradey - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Small hotel, excellent location without the hefty price tag
thread.title_full: Small hotel, excellent location without the hefty price tag - Review of Le Pradey, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Silvie L
title: Small hotel, excellent location without the hefty price tag
text:
I would recommend this hotel for a weekend in Paris as it is in Great location, but no real reception at the hotel. No bar, but it has a ingenious vine vending machine and small place to sit down and relax in a mezzanine above the reception.
Smallish rooms but very well design. Very stylish interior. Very good for couples, but I would not recommended for families as this hotel is very small. No parking at the hotel; there is some street parking, but you would have to be super lucky. Great staff, very helpful and friendly. Very good breakfast. Good value for money
Room Tip: We stayed in Le Carres room and had balcony and view of Louvre See more room tips
